title: Buff all skills to B-grade CSO
description: 19 of 34 skills score F on CSO. Systematic improvement needed: add timing gates (MANDATORY/BEFORE/FIRST), add trigger phrases in quotes, add method previews. Use skill-forge tools to validate.
design: Priority order: 1) Fix 6 name/directory mismatches first (blocking errors), 2) Session lifecycle skills (session-opening, session-closing), 3) High-use skills (todoist-gtd, beads, google-workspace), 4) Anthropic skills if we want to PR upstream. Target: all skills B-grade (80+) or higher.

title: Fix skill name/directory mismatches
description: 6 skills have name/dir mismatches because repos are named skill-* but symlinked without prefix. Affected: chrome-log, dbt, google-workspace, itv-styling, mem, appscript. Either rename repos or teach linter about symlinks.
design: Option A: Rename repos to drop skill- prefix. Option B: Update linter to resolve symlinks and check the actual skill name vs resolved path. Option A is cleaner but more disruptive.

title: Teach linter about symlinks
description: lint_skill.py checks name vs directory but doesn't resolve symlinks. Skills in repos named skill-foo are symlinked to ~/.claude/skills/foo, causing false name mismatch errors.
design: In check_name(), resolve skill_dir with Path.resolve() before comparing to name. Add flag --no-symlink-resolve for strict mode if needed.
